info.title: DSP System
info.description: DSP System - Driver, Vehicle, Schedule & Asset Management Platform

get.description: Health check endpoint.

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token.

Driver login - authenticate using Amazon ID and password.

Requirements:
- Driver must have valid amazon_id and password
- Driver must have a schedule for today to login

Returns JWT token for driver app authentication.

get.description:
Get today's schedule information and existing inspection (if any).

Returns:
- schedule: Today's schedule with vehicle and route assignment
- existing_inspection: Today's inspection record if already created

put.description:
Update today's inspection record.

Driver can only update today's inspection.
Allows updating photos, mileage, and notes multiple times within the same day.

post.description:
Create today's vehicle inspection record.

Driver can only create one inspection per day.
Photo URLs should be obtained from /api/v1/files/batch-upload first.

Workflow:
1. Driver uploads photos to /api/v1/files/batch-upload
2. Get photo URLs from response
3. Call this endpoint with inspection_urls array

get.description: Get current user information.

List all users.

User roles:
- 0 (Admin): Superuser - only one allowed in the system
- 1 (Manager): Manager - can have multiple

schema.title: Response List Users Api V1 Users  Get

post.description:
Create new user.

User roles:
- 0 (Admin): Superuser - only ONE allowed in the system
- 1 (Manager): Manager - can have multiple

Note: Only one admin (role 0) is allowed in the system.

get.description: Get user by ID.

put.description:
Update user.

User roles:
- 0 (Admin): Superuser - only ONE allowed in the system
- 1 (Manager): Manager - can have multiple

Password change:
- To change password, MUST provide both old_password and password fields
- old_password will be verified before allowing password change

Restrictions:
- Cannot change role to admin (0) if another admin already exists
- Cannot remove admin role from the only admin

delete.description:
Delete user.

Cannot delete:
- Your own account
- The admin (role 0, superuser) account

get.description: List all drivers.

schema.title: Response List Drivers Api V1 Drivers  Get

post.description:
Create new driver.

Required fields:
- name: Driver name
- amazon_id: Amazon ID
- password: Login password for driver app

get.description: Get driver by ID.

put.description:
更新司机信息（支持同时更新基本信息和文件）

- 可以只更新基本信息
- 可以通过license_file_url/visa_file_url直接传URL数组（JSON字符串格式）
- 可以通过license_files/visa_files上传新文件
- 也可以同时更新

示例：
- license_file_url: '["http://localhost:8000/api/v1/files/download/1", "http://localhost:8000/api/v1/files/download/2"]'

delete.description: Delete driver and all associated files from MinIO storage.

post.description: Import Amazon IDs from Excel/CSV file.
Set or reset password for driver app login (Admin only).

delete.description:
删除指定的驾照文件

- file_url: 要删除的文件URL

删除指定的签证文件

- file_url: 要删除的文件URL

get.description: 获取即将过期的驾照和签证列表
List all vehicles with optional filters.

schema.title: Response List Vehicles Api V1 Vehicles  Get

post.description: Create new vehicle.

get.description: List available vehicles (condition=0: available) for assignment.

schema.title: Response List Available Vehicles Api V1 Vehicles Available Get

post.description:
Admin review/approve inspection (admin only).

Admins can:
- Set inspection status (inspection_status: 0=pending, 1=passed, 2=failed)
- Add review notes/feedback (admin_notes)

Admins CANNOT update the inspection content (date, mileage, photos).

get.description:
List vehicle inspection records with optional filters.

Query parameters:
- vehicle_id: Filter by vehicle ID
- driver_id: Filter by driver ID
- reviewed: Filter by review status (true/false)
- inspection_status: Filter by inspection status (0=pending, 1=passed, 2=failed)
- inspection_date: Filter by specific date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- start_date: Filter by date range start (YYYY-MM-DD)
- end_date: Filter by date range end (YYYY-MM-DD)
- skip: Pagination offset
- limit: Maximum records to return

Examples:
- Get all inspections for vehicle 1: ?vehicle_id=1
- Get inspections on specific date: ?inspection_date=2025-11-22
- Get inspections in date range: ?start_date=2025-11-01&end_date=2025-11-30
- Get unreviewed inspections: ?reviewed=false
- Get pending inspections: ?inspection_status=0
- Get passed inspections: ?inspection_status=1
- Get failed inspections: ?inspection_status=2

schema.title: Response List Inspections Api V1 Vehicles Inspections Get

get.description: List vehicles that need maintenance soon.

schema.title: Response List Vehicles Maintenance Due Api V1 Vehicles Maintenance Due Get

get.description: Get vehicle detail by ID with photos and recent inspections.

Get inspection records with photos for a specific vehicle.

Query parameters:
- vehicle_id (required): Vehicle ID
- inspection_date (optional): Filter by specific date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
- skip: Number of records to skip (pagination)
- limit: Maximum number of records to return

Returns inspection records grouped by date, each with photo arrays.

schema.title: Response Get Vehicle Inspection Photos Api V1 Vehicles  Vehicle Id  Inspection Photos Get

get.description:
Get comprehensive usage history for a vehicle.

This includes:
- Schedule assignments (when the vehicle was assigned to drivers)
- Inspection records with photos (from drivers' daily inspections)
- Maintenance records

获取排班列表

- 如果指定了schedule_date且数据库中没有该日期的数据，会自动从Deputy同步（除非auto_sync=False）
- 支持按deputy_id和checkin_status过滤

schema.title: Response List Schedules Api V1 Schedules  Get

get.description:
获取今天的排班

- 如果数据库中没有今天的数据，会自动从Deputy同步（除非auto_sync=False）

parameters.name: auto_sync

schema.description: 如果数据库没有数据，是否自动同步Deputy
schema.title: Auto Sync

parameters.description: 如果数据库没有数据，是否自动同步Deputy

schema.title: Response Get Today Schedules Api V1 Schedules Today Get

get.description: 获取指定排班详情

put.description:
更新排班信息

可更新字段：driver_id, route, vehicle, checkin_status

**注意**:
- 如果提供了 driver_id，会自动从 Driver 表中查找并更新 deputy_id, driver_name, amazon_id
- confirm_status 不能通过此端点修改，必须使用 POST /schedules/{id}/confirm 端点

post.description: 手动同步指定日期的Deputy排班数据
手动同步今天的Deputy排班数据

上传 Amazon route 文件并自动匹配更新排班的 route 字段

- **file**: Amazon route Excel 文件 (.xlsx)
- **import_date**: 要更新的排班日期（默认今天）

**工作流程**:
1. 解析 Excel 文件获取 route_code <-> transporter_id 映射
2. 查询指定日期的所有排班
3. 通过 schedule.amazon_id == transporter_id 匹配
4. 批量更新匹配到的 schedule.route = route_code
5. 返回详细的匹配和更新统计

**必需字段**: Route code, Transporter ID

parameters.name: import_date

schema.description: 导入到哪一天的排班（默认今天）
schema.title: Import Date

parameters.description: 导入到哪一天的排班（默认今天）

post.description:
确认排班并发送SMS通知给司机

**必填项检查**:
- ✅ driver (amazon_id) - 司机的Amazon ID必须已分配
- ✅ route - 路线必须已分配
- ✅ vehicle - 车辆必须已分配

**功能**:
1. 验证所有必填项都已分配（司机Amazon ID、路线、车辆）
2. 更新 confirm_status 为 CONFIRMED
3. 查找对应的Driver（通过deputy_id）
4. 发送SMS通知给司机，包含：
   - 司机姓名
   - 路线 (route)
   - 车辆 (vehicle)
   - 时间 (start_time ~ end_time)

**SMS通知示例**:
```
Hi John, your schedule confirmed!
Date: 2025-12-30
Route: DBS7-01A
Vehicle: Van 10
Time: 08:00 - 18:00
```

get.description:
获取系统配置（所有用户可见）

返回所有系统配置项的当前值：
- admin_phone: 管理员提醒电话
- driver_file_reminder_days: 司机文件临期提醒周期（10/15/30天）
- daily_sms_time: 司机每日确认短信时间（HH:MM格式）
- maintenance_booking_reminder_days: 保养预约提醒周期（10/15/30天）
- next_maintenance_reminder_days: 下次保养临近提醒周期（10/15/30天）

put.description:
更新系统配置（批量更新）

可以一次更新多个配置项，只需要提供需要更新的字段。

配置说明：
- admin_phone: 管理员提醒电话（用于接收系统通知）
- driver_file_reminder_days: 司机文件临期提醒周期，建议值: 10, 15, 30天
- daily_sms_time: 每日发送司机确认短信的时间（24小时制，如 "08:00"）
- maintenance_booking_reminder_days: 保养预约提醒周期，建议值: 10, 15, 30天
- next_maintenance_reminder_days: 下次保养临近提醒周期，建议值: 10, 15, 30天

post.description:
创建/初始化系统配置

首次设置系统配置，可以提供所有或部分配置项。
未提供的配置项将使用默认值。

配置说明：
- admin_phone: 管理员提醒电话（用于接收系统通知）
- driver_file_reminder_days: 司机文件临期提醒周期，建议值: 10, 15, 30天
- daily_sms_time: 每日发送司机确认短信的时间（24小时制，如 "08:00"）
- maintenance_booking_reminder_days: 保养预约提醒周期，建议值: 10, 15, 30天
- next_maintenance_reminder_days: 下次保养临近提醒周期，建议值: 10, 15, 30天

get.description:
Get dashboard statistics matching the UI layout.

Returns:
- Total Drivers (active count)
- Total Vehicles (in use count)
- Today's Schedules (active schedules)
- Vehicles Need Attention (repair + unavailable)
- Vehicle Status Overview (Available, Need Repair, Unavailable, In Use)
- Driver Status Overview (Active, Inactive, Total)
Get dashboard alerts that need attention.

获取 Deputy 员工列表（包含头像等详细信息）

返回员工列表，包含以下字段：
- Id: Deputy 员工 ID
- DisplayName: 姓名
- Email: 邮箱
- Mobile: 手机号

schema.title: Response Get Deputy Employees Api V1 Supervise Employee Get

get.description:
获取单个 Deputy 员工详情

- **employee_id**: Deputy 员工 ID

schema.title: Response Get Deputy Employee Api V1 Supervise Employee  Employee Id  Get

同步 Deputy 员工到系统驱动程序表

将 Deputy 中的员工数据同步到本地 drivers 表

schema.title: Response Sync Deputy Employees Api V1 Supervise Sync Employees Post

get.description: 获取指定日期范围的 Deputy roster 数据

schema.title: Response Get Rosters Api V1 Supervise Rosters Get

get.description:
预览 Deputy rosters 数据（不写入数据库）

**功能**:
- 从 Deputy API 获取指定日期的 rosters
- 匹配数据库中的 Driver（通过 deputy_id）
- 显示每个 roster 的状态 (ready/exists/no_driver)
- **不写入数据库**，**不显示 amazon_id**

**返回**:
- 简化的 roster 列表（司机名称、时间、状态）
- 可同步数量统计

post.description:
同步 Deputy rosters 到数据库

**功能**:
- 从 Deputy API 获取指定日期的 rosters
- 匹配数据库中的 Driver（通过 deputy_id）
- **从 Driver 表获取最新的 amazon_id 并同步到 Schedule**
- 创建或更新 Schedule 记录
- 返回同步统计和 amazon_id 信息

**重要**:
- 会自动从 Driver 表同步 amazon_id 到 Schedule
- 如果 Driver 有 amazon_id，Schedule 也会被更新

上传文件到 MinIO/Wasabi 存储并保存到数据库

- **file**: 要上传的文件
- **folder**: 存储文件夹路径（可选，默认 "uploads"）

返回数据库记录（包含ID）

delete.description:
从 MinIO/Wasabi 和数据库中删除文件

- **file_id**: 数据库中的文件记录ID

get.description:
列出数据库中的所有文件记录

- **folder**: 文件夹过滤（可选，例如 "uploads", "drivers"）

返回文件记录列表（包含ID）

schema.title: Response List Files Api V1 Files List Get

post.description:
批量上传多个文件到 MinIO/Wasabi 存储并保存到数据库

- **files**: 要上传的文件列表
- **folder**: 存储文件夹路径（可选，默认 "uploads"）

返回所有上传文件的数据库记录（包含ID）

批量删除多个文件

- **file_ids**: 要删除的文件记录ID列表

get.description:
通过后端代理访问文件（带权限控制，在浏览器中显示）

- **file_id**: 文件记录ID

post.description:
Send SMS to a single recipient.

**Permissions**: Requires authenticated user

**Parameters**:
- phone: Recipient phone number with country code (e.g., +61451728450)
- message: SMS message content (max 1600 characters)

**Returns**: Success status and provider information

Send SMS to multiple recipients.

**Permissions**: Requires authenticated user

**Parameters**:
- phones: List of recipient phone numbers with country codes
- message: SMS message content (max 1600 characters)

**Returns**: Statistics on sent/failed messages

get.description:
Get SMS service configuration status.

**Permissions**: Requires authenticated user

**Returns**: Current SMS provider and service status

post.description:
Send email to a single recipient.

**Permissions**: Requires authenticated user

**📧 IMPORTANT - Email Configuration Required:**
To enable email sending, you MUST configure SMTP settings in `.env` file:

```env
# Email Service (SMTP)
SMTP_HOST=smtp.gmail.com           # CHANGE THIS to your SMTP server
SMTP_PORT=587                      # CHANGE THIS if using different port (e.g., 465 for SSL)
SMTP_USER=your-email@gmail.com     # CHANGE THIS to your email address
SMTP_PASSWORD=your-app-password    # CHANGE THIS to your email password or app password
SMTP_FROM=noreply@dspsystem.com    # CHANGE THIS to your sender email
```

**For Gmail:**
1. Enable 2FA on your Google account
2. Generate App Password: https://myaccount.google.com/apppasswords
3. Use the 16-character app password as SMTP_PASSWORD

**For other providers:**
- Outlook/Office365: smtp.office365.com:587
- Yahoo: smtp.mail.yahoo.com:587
- Custom SMTP: Contact your email provider

**Parameters**:
- to_email: Recipient email address
- subject: Email subject line
- body: Email content (plain text or HTML)
- html: Set to true if body contains HTML
- cc: Optional CC recipients
- bcc: Optional BCC recipients

**Returns**: Success status and message

Send email to multiple recipients.

**Permissions**: Requires authenticated user

**📧 SMTP Configuration Required** - See `/email/send` endpoint documentation for setup instructions.

**Parameters**:
- recipients: List of recipient email addresses
- subject: Email subject line
- body: Email content (plain text or HTML)
- html: Set to true if body contains HTML

**Returns**: Statistics on sent/failed emails

get.description:
Get email service configuration status.

**Permissions**: Requires authenticated user

**Returns**: Current email service status and configuration hints

**If disabled, configure in .env:**
```env
SMTP_HOST=smtp.gmail.com
SMTP_PORT=587
SMTP_USER=your-email@gmail.com
SMTP_PASSWORD=your-app-password
SMTP_FROM=noreply@dspsystem.com
```

Get overall notification services status.

**Permissions**: Requires authenticated user

**Returns**: Status of all notification services (SMS + Email)
Root endpoint.

schedule_date.description: Schedule date (ISO 8601 date format: YYYY-MM-DD). Represents the roster date from Deputy, not necessarily the shift start date for overnight shifts.

start_time.description: Shift start time (ISO 8601 datetime format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS). Timezone-aware timestamp for shift start.

end_time.title: End Time
end_time.description: Shift end time (ISO 8601 datetime format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS). Timezone-aware timestamp for shift end. May be next day for overnight shifts.

checkin_status.description: Driver check-in status (enum string). Possible values: 'not_checked_in' (default), 'checked_in', 'checked_out'.

confirm_status.description: Driver confirmation status (enum string). Possible values: 'pending' (default), 'confirmed', 'rejected'. Used to track driver acknowledgment of shift.

reminder_sms_sent.description: Reminder SMS sent flag (boolean). True if reminder SMS has been sent to driver.

assignment_sms_sent.title: Assignment Sms Sent
assignment_sms_sent.description: Assignment SMS sent flag (boolean). True if assignment SMS (with route/vehicle info) has been sent to driver.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Record creation timestamp (ISO 8601 datetime format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS). Auto-generated on record creation.

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: Record last update timestamp (ISO 8601 datetime format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS). Auto-updated on any field change.

UserCreate.title: UserCreate
UserCreate.description:
Schema for creating a new user.

Roles:
